alert.note: Alert for Bernalillo; Sandoval; Santa Fe; Torrance; Valencia (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Dust Storm Warning issued February 26 at 12:13PM MST until February 26 at 1:45PM MST by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: The National Weather Service in Albuquerque has issued a * Dust Storm Warning for... Valencia County in central New Mexico... Southeastern Sandoval County in north central New Mexico... Southwestern Santa Fe County in north central New Mexico... Bernalillo County in central New Mexico... Northwestern Torrance County in central New Mexico... * Until 145 PM MST. * At 1212 PM MST, a wall of dust was along a line through the middle Rio Grande Valley and was moving east. HAZARD...Less than a quarter mile visibility with damaging wind in excess of 60 mph. SOURCE...Doppler radar. IMPACT...Dangerous life-threatening travel. * This includes the following highways... Interstate 40 between Mile Markers 140 and 186. Interstate 25 between Mile Markers 185 and 270. Highway 550 between Mile Markers 1 and 21. Locations impacted include... Albuquerque, Rio Rancho, Los Lunas, Bernalillo, Belen, Valencia, Corrales, Los Ranchos De Albuquerque, Bosque Farms and Edgewood. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Motorists should not drive into a dust storm. PULL ASIDE STAY ALIVE!

area.areaDesc: Bernalillo; Sandoval; Santa Fe; Torrance; Valencia
